MICROSOFT-ONLINE.START_SESSION_SUCCESS: This document is being edited in Office Online.
MICROSOFT-ONLINE.CANCEL_SESSION_SUCCESS: Edits made to this document have been discarded.
MICROSOFT-ONLINE.CANCEL_SESSION_DENIED: An error has occurred. Contact your administrator if it persists.
MICROSOFT-ONLINE.END_SESSION_SUCCESS: This document is no longer being edited in Office Online.
MICROSOFT-ONLINE.END_SESSION_DENIED: An error has occurred. Contact your administrator if it persists.
MICROSOFT-ONLINE.RESUME_SESSION: This file is being edited in Office Online. You can edit this file at the same time.

END_EDITING_DIALOG.END_OPTION: Save all edits to this document
END_EDITING_DIALOG.END_OPTION_DETAILS: A new version will be created
END_EDITING_DIALOG.CHANGES: What level of changes were made?
END_EDITING_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: This will prevent further editing of the document for all users currently accessing it with Microsoft Office Online.
